625100.name: TileSetGenerator
625100.description:
Make tilesets for your games in minutes.

Main features:

  • Automatic tileset generation:
    • Rectangular tilesets
    • Isometric tilesets
    • Hexagonal type A tilesets
    • Hexagonal type B tilesets
    • Platformer tilesets
    • Street/path tilesets
  • Resize tile
  • Select the number of columns in tileset
  • Change the distance between tiles
  • Specify the type of blending transitions between tiles (with or without blurring)
  • Create custom masks
  • Replace tile and all its mixes in the finished tileset
  • Changing tile position in tileset
  • Selects the background color (transparent for .png)
  • Saving and loading project .tsg
  • Saving the finished tileset to .png or .bmp
  • Exporting the created tiles in single files

The program generates a tile transition map from textures (using built-in masks). You can select how many textures will be mixed (1-4). And of course you can select any textures you want.
The program then combines these tiles into a tile set, and you can change the position of the tiles and change the number of columns.

All tiles can be used for commercial purposes.

Yes, you can save to PNG and use the output from this program in GameMaker, RPG Maker, Construct, AppGameKit, Tiled Map Editor,...
